results.title: Pleiotropic Effects of Simvastatin and Losartan in Preclinical Models of Post-Traumatic Elbow Contracture
results.text_hl: Pleiotropic Effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@Losartan@@@ in Preclinical Models of @<m>DISEASE_Contracture</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003286 @@@Post-Traumatic Elbow Contracture@@@

results.title: Simvastatin Reduces Capsular Fibrosis around Silicone Implants
results.text_hl: In this study, we investigated the protective effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, a member of the statin group, on radiation-induced periprosthetic @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@capsular fibrosis@@@ and the potential therapeutic value of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ for prevention of @<m>DISEASE_Contracture</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003286 @@@capsular contracture@@@.

citations.NLM: Chung KJ, Park KR, Lee JH, Kim TG, Kim YH. Simvastatin Reduces Capsular Fibrosis around Silicone Implants J Korean Med Sci. 2016 Aug;31(8):1273-8. PMID: 27478339

results.title: Statins alter intracellular calcium homeostasis in malignant hyperthermia susceptible individuals.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: There were no differences in weight, length, and predrug baseline tension between the groups. Both @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ induced significant @<m>DISEASE_Contracture</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003286 @@@contractures@@@ in muscle @DISEASE_Accessory_Atrioventricular_Bundle @DISEASE_MESH:D058606 @@@bundles@@@ from MHS @SPECIES_9823 @@@pigs@@@.

citations.NLM: Metterlein T, Schuster F, Tadda L, Hager M, Roewer N, Anetseder M. Statins alter intracellular calcium homeostasis in malignant hyperthermia susceptible individuals. Cardiovasc Ther. 2010 Dec;28(6):356-60. PMID: 20955541
